ai-patthana15.77:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.77:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the river, the forecourt,
ai-patthana15.77:1.1_0: Not seeing have gone for refuge to the teaching, the Dhamma should be given up for refuge.
ai-patthana15.77:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.77:2.1_0: By developing, they give up the teachings and the cause negligence that gives rise to refuge.
ai-patthana15.77:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.77:3.1_0: Not realizing anything that can be given up, they don’t develop, and cultivate it. Nor should be given up by development.
ai-patthana15.77:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
